apple_vendor_description: This loving emoji on Apple devices portrays a tender kiss between a woman and a man, with both figures rendered in light skin tones and medium-light skin tones respectively, showcasing Apple's commitment to diverse representation. Their faces are brought close together, with closed eyes and soft, rounded lips suggesting intimacy and affection, all illuminated by Apple's signature realistic lighting and subtle glossy highlights. On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully symbolizes romance, partnership, and heartfelt goodbyes.
